p.s: Today many people among us have a multi-ethnic background and immigrated from another country.
Among these people is the 41-year-old Faraj al-Byarshan who immigrated to New York from Iraq in 2005.
His reasons for immigration were war in his home country and poverty.
He has also a wife and two sons, so he decided to immigrate to the USA.
His wife and two sons immigratd two years after him because he had to be sure to have a safe and well paid job to have enough money for his family.
At first it was a hard time for him in the USA because he's an engineer and had problems to find work.
He had also to deal with discrimination because of his outer appearance.
But he's also a very educated man and is able to speak englishEnglish, so he got the chance to work as an engineer again.
Since then he worked really hard for his family and they passed all the citizenship.
His hopes for the future are that his kids can have a better future due the better education and living standards they have in the USA.
